Headline: #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd.Temporary Southbound Reroute near Irving Park/Keeler
ShortDescription: SB54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Montrose, Pulaski and Irving Park: due to, street blockage near Irving Park/Keeler.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Montrose, Pulaski and Irving Park: due to, street blockage near Irving Park/Keeler.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
